message: Hi Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the product for $13,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, considering the product's value is worth $8,000 to you.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While I understand your perspective, the product's value to me is closer to its value to you.  How about we settle at $11,500?
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $11,000. How about we meet in the middle at $10,750?
